valid: For the period 00:00 (UTC) on Wed 21 Jan 2026 to 00:00 (UTC) on Thu 22 Jan 2026
general_synopsis: Low 400 miles west of Shannon 977 expected southwestern Ireland 974 by 1800 Wednesday. Low Rockall 981 moving away slowly northwestwards
